Thanks to Jeffrey Wilson and Ted Robertson for thisreport
THE CORRECT DATE FOR THE ARTICLE
IS SEPTEMBER 21, 2003





DEVILTRY COMETH - ObfuscationEfforts reported in Highland County, OH

The following item is courtesyof Pat Mason, who has discovered a possible attempt to hoax a crop circlein Highland County, Ohio on September 5th. This reference was found inthe online logs posted at the Highland County Sheriff's website ( https://highlandcoso.com/nr.htm) and the text of concern states: "An investigation was initiated onthe report of damage to a corn field on Fisher Road, New Vienna, Ohio,Upon further investigation it was found that a vehicle had entered thecornfield and attempted to make some type of design to resemble a cropcircle then left the field. This offense remains under investigation."
